question_text: Which of the following are functions of a print server? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Queue print jobs from multiple users
Restrict print access by user or group
Allow monitoring of pending print jobs
correct_answer: Queue print jobs from multiple users
Restrict print access by user or group
Allow monitoring of pending print jobs
explanation: Print servers handle job queuing, permissions, and monitoringâ€”hardware functions like cleaning printer heads are done by the printer itself.
